name: Stuck in the Mud BETA
description:
Based on the childhood playground game 'Stuck in the Mud,' you and your friends must work together to defeat the Mud Monster trying to stick you in the mud! Alternatively, one of you will be morphed into the Monster and must catch all your friends before they wash your muddy form away!

Minimum 3 players required.

Controllers required.

Credits :

Rebecca Daly - Project Lead, Lead designer of Field Map, UI Artist, 3D model designer

Harrison McCann - Lead designer of Garden map, 3D model designer

Samuel Waite - Lead Programmer

Henry Smith - Lead designer of Sandbox Map, 3D Model Designer

Zoe Frost - Sound designer, Music composer

Chloe-Jayne Harris - Concept artist, Character artist, Character animator
